ingredients.ingredient: 1 French baguette, cut into diagonal 1/2 inch slices
4 ounces high-quality dark chocolate, broken into 1-inch pieces

cookingTips: Toast baguette slices until crispy for better textural contrast with melted chocolate
Use high-quality dark chocolate for superior flavor and smooth melting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through creating an elegant appetizer with crispy crostini topped with dark chocolate and sea salt.
